  description: test service description
  title: test service
  version: 1.0.0

    get:
      description: Get test data (description)
      operationId: GetTestData
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTestDataResponse'
      summary: Get test data
components:
  schemas:
    GetTestDataResponse:
      properties:
        body:
          description: get test data response body
          type: string
      type: object
